snippet.title: Monstrum 2 - Malacosm Teaser | 2021
snippet.description:
Security Breach: Specimen has Escaped. Take control this January, before it takes control of you.
Wishlist now on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1093170/Monstrum_2/

Last chance to pre-order for a discounted price, bonus skins, and an exclusive nameplate!
Pre-order: https://monstrumgame.com/
Pre-order on Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/monstrum-2?hmb_source=search_bar

Monstrum 2 is an asymmetric multiplayer game for those looking to take survival horror to the next level. Pit yourself against a terrifying monster as a team of up to 4 human prisoners, locked in a tactical struggle to escape a decrepit sea fortress, or play as one of the many horrifying monstrosities hunting them down.

The procedurally-generated environment changes with each playthrough, so stay on your feet as the layout, puzzles, items, and obstacles are randomized in each match.

#Monstrum2 #Monstrum #Junkfish #TeamJunkfish #horror #horrorgames #indiegames #indiehorror #survivalhorror #multiplayer #multiplayergames #madewithunity #teasertrailer #4v1 #malacosm #monsters #onlinegame #coopgame #game #gaming #steam #comingsoon
